name: Orchestration Audit System Implementation Session
description: Complete workflow for building JSON-first orchestration audit system with auto-generated documentation and diagrams

beats.title: Analyze Orchestration Requirements
beats.description: Understand 16 orchestration domains and their relationships

beats.title: Define orchestration-domains.json Schema
beats.description: Create unified schema for all domains with metadata

beats.title: Map All 16 Orchestration Domains
beats.description: Document each domain with movements, beats, relationships

movements.name: JSON Source Creation
movements.description: Create orchestration-domains.json as single source of truth

beats.title: Create orchestration-domains.json
beats.description: Write comprehensive JSON registry with all 16 domains

beats.title: Define Unified MusicalSequence Interface
beats.description: Reference packages/musical-conductor SequenceTypes.ts

beats.title: Map Domain Relationships
beats.description: Document how domains connect and depend on each other

movements.name: Documentation Generation
movements.description: Create scripts to generate markdown from JSON

beats.title: Create gen-orchestration-docs.js
beats.description: Script to generate markdown documentation from JSON

beats.title: Add ASCII Sketches for All Domains
beats.description: Create visual representations of each domain's workflow

beats.title: Generate Documentation Files
beats.description: Run script to produce 3 markdown files with sketches

movements.name: Diagram Generation
movements.description: Create scripts to generate Mermaid diagrams

beats.title: Create gen-orchestration-diagram.js
beats.description: Script to generate Mermaid diagrams from JSON

beats.title: Generate orchestration-system.mmd
beats.description: Create unified system architecture diagram

beats.title: Generate domain-relationships.mmd
beats.description: Create domain relationship visualization

beats.title: Create audit-orchestration.js
beats.description: Script to validate entire orchestration system

beats.title: Validate All 16 Domains
beats.description: Check domain definitions and required fields

beats.title: Validate Domain Relationships
beats.description: Verify all referenced domains exist

beats.title: Validate Generated Files
beats.description: Check all documentation and diagrams exist

beats.title: Align with MusicalSequence Standard
beats.description: Verify all sequences use canonical interface

beats.title: Enforce JSON-First Protocol
beats.description: Remove manually-created markdown files

beats.title: Prevent Documentation Drift
beats.description: Mark all generated files with DO NOT EDIT headers

beats.title: Run Orchestration Audit
beats.description: Execute audit-orchestration.js to validate system

beats.title: Verify Generated Documentation
beats.description: Check all markdown files with ASCII sketches

beats.title: Verify Generated Diagrams
beats.description: Check all Mermaid diagram files

movements.name: Context Tree Creation
movements.description: Create context tree for next agent

beats.title: Create Session Context Tree
beats.description: Generate .generated/context-tree-orchestration-audit-session.json

beats.title: Document Complete Workflow
beats.description: Create this orchestration-audit-session.json sequence

beats.title: Enable Agent Handoff
beats.description: Provide complete context for next agent to continue work
